did.unittitle: Office of Business and Finance. Financial audits and reports.

origination.label: Creator
origination.corpname: University of California, Los Angeles. Office of Business and Finance

did.abstract: Record Series 513 contains financial audits and reports generated by the the Office of Business and Finance at the University of California, Los Angeles.

accessrestrict.head: Access
accessrestrict.p: COLLECTION STORED OFF-SITE AT SRLF: Open for research. Advance notice required for access. Contact the UCLA Library Special Collections Reference Desk for paging information.

userestrict.head: Publication Rights
userestrict.p: Copyright of portions of this collection has been assigned to The Regents of the University of California. The UCLA University Archives can grant permission to publish for materials to which it holds the copyright. All requests for permission to publish or quote must be submitted in writing to the UCLA University Archivist.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: [Identification of item], Office of Business and Finance. Financial audits and reports (University Archives Record Series 513). UCLA Library Special Collections, University Archives.

bioghist.head: Historical note
bioghist.p: The Office of Business and Finance at the University of California, Los Angeles is responsible for maintaining the University's financial accountability as well as budget and reporting services.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: Record Series 513 contains financial audits and reports generated by the the Office of Business and Finance at the University of California, Los Angeles. Files document committees, task forces, policies, internal audits, external audits, financial reviews, reports, and other financial and business activities. These materials regard academic departments, centers of study, medical centers, institutes, programs, projects, sources of private funding, taxes, payroll, budget reviews, and statuses. Additionally, the collection features administrative materials generated by the Office of Business and Finance.
This is an inactive record series; no additional University records are expected to be added.

odd.head: UCLA Catalog Record ID
odd.p: We are committed to providing ethical, inclusive, and anti-racist description of the materials we steward, and to remediating existing description of our materials that contains language that may be offensive or cause harm. We invite you to submit feedback about how our collections are described, and how they could be described more accurately, by filling out the form located on our website: Report Potentially Offensive Description in Library Special Collections.

Policies apply to campus accounts, organizations, and students, one card.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Includes Federal Research Project (1977-1990); County of Los Angeles Operating Agreement (1976-1992); Financial Aid for US Government (1977-1990); NCAA Intercollegiate Athletics (1986-1992); Management Research Association (1980); and Medical Faculty Compensation (1987-1988).

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Includes OMBA-110 for US Government (1981-1990); UCLA Foundation Deloitie, Haskins & Sells (DH&S) Audit of Development Program (1979-1981); UCLA Foundation Compliance Review (1987-1988); and UCLA Theater Group (1986-1991).

did.unittitle: Regents' audit - Peat, Marwick, Mitchell & Co. (PM&M).
School of Public Health - indepth review.
Administrative Affairs Council - report of audits.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Includes Campus Computing Network (1969-1984); Biology (1982-1984); Financial Aid (1990-1992); Microbiology and Immunology (1982-1988); Payroll (1981-1983); Surgery Oncology Cost Transfer (1977-1985); DOE Lab of Biomedical Environmental Science (1874-1987); NIH-Patient Care (1986-1987); Health Professions Student Loan Program (1986); and American Institute of Maghrib Studies (1985-1987).

did.unittitle: Federal audit - resolution/extrapolation of sample data.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Includes NIH-NPI Dr. Louis West (1988); Academic Summer Salaries (1974-1982); Audit Process (1979-1989); Computer Utilization (1971-1981); Cost Transfers (1979-1981); Equipment Procurement (1975-1981); Equipment Screening (1976-1982); Individual Campuses (1976-1977); Labor Distribution (1976-1977); Prior Approval (1978); Recharges (1975-1981); Unclaimed Federally Funded Checks (1977-1978); and Vacation Leave (1975-1977).

did.unittitle: State of California audits - general correspondence.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Includes Specific Areas (1978-1989); Auditor General (1978-1992); Fiscal Controls (1987); Hayden Warehouse (1982); and Tissue Typing (1985).

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Including Specific Areas (1993); Harbor/UCLA Tripartite (1987); Laboratory of Biomedical Environmental Sciences (1986-1987); Samuel Goldwyn Foundation (1980-1984); Payroll (1984); and Workers' Compensation (1987).
